alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has extended the * Flood Advisory for... Southeastern Escambia County in south central Alabama... North Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... Northern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain has fallen so far this afternoon and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area as more storms push through early this evening. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Century, Flomaton, East Brewton, Jay, Pollard, Riverview, Mount Carmel, Dixonville, Welka, Wahl, Fidelis, Osaka, South Flomaton, Sellersville, Bluff Springs, Byrneville, McLellan, Roberts, Wawbeek and Belandville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
